title: 3 Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms single house for lease
posting_body: Our Farm house is conveniently located in Farmersville, Only 5 minutes from BBQ and fishing lake ！all schools in around 10 minutes including a college, newly renovated, 4.48 acres, the house has 1333 square feet, 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, has a large deck, idyllic scenery without pressure, lots of grass for easy maintenance  Live animals such as cattle and sheep, as well as a seasonal pond, make the pastoral life stress-free!
